233.movie_name: Children of Paradise (Les enfants du paradis) (1945)
233.movie_plot: The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan and the four men who love her.

19.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

257.movie_plot: The story of the final Emperor of China.

324.movie_plot: Harry ignores warnings not to return to Hogwarts, only to find the school plagued by a series of mysterious attacks and a strange voice haunting him.

93.movie_plot: Set in the 1880s, the story of how, during a creative dry spell, the partnership of the legendary musical/theatrical writers Gilbert and Sullivan almost dissolves, before they turn it all around and write the Mikado.

51.movie_plot: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight heavy-weight champion Apollo Creed in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

3.movie_plot: Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship, but it may not stay platonic for long.

127.movie_plot: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

95.movie_plot: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

289.movie_plot: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

21.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

180.movie_plot: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

134.movie_plot: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

108.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

124.movie_plot: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

146.movie_plot: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

54.movie_plot: A gunslinger is embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

281.movie_plot: When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

101.movie_plot: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

159.movie_plot: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college, and one of their cousins--an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules and manners--comes in to defend them.

32.movie_plot: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

205.movie_plot: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

182.movie_plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

267.movie_plot: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.

320.movie_plot: A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.

310.movie_plot: A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

271.movie_plot: Damien the Antichrist, now thirteen years old, finally learns of his destiny under the guidance of an unholy disciple of Satan. Meanwhile dark forces begin to eliminate all those who suspect the child's true identity.

244.movie_plot: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

89.movie_plot: Around 1940, New Yorker staff writer Joe Mitchell meets Joe Gould, a Greenwich Village character who cadges meals, drinks, and contributions to the Joe Gould Fund and who is writing a ...

260.movie_plot: A sweet mother takes a little too much at heart for the defense of her family.

218.movie_plot: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

242.movie_plot: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

71.movie_plot: A local sheriff, a marine biologist and an old seafarer team up to hunt down a great white shark wrecking havoc in a beach resort.

315.movie_plot: The lives of two struggling musicians, who happen to be brothers, inevitably change when they team up with a beautiful, up-and-coming singer.

323.movie_plot: Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity.

240.movie_plot: The families of children who died, sue two companies for dumping toxic waste: a tort so expensive to prove, the case could bankrupt their lawyers.

116.movie_plot: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

188.movie_plot: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

166.movie_plot: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

272.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.
